Tip: Simply add a file in the `_posts` directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Tip: Code snippets: 

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Vic')
#=> prints 'Hi, Vic' to STDOUT.
